import Module from "../../common/module";
import GridController from "./grid-controller";
import "./grid-directive.less";
import Grid from "./grid-directive";
import GridService from "./grid-service";
import GridToolbarTransclude from "./gridToolbarTransclude-directive";
import GridToolbarContainer from "./gridToolbarContainer-directive";
import xuiStatic from "../../xui-static";
 
export default (module:Module)=> {
    module.controller("xuiGridController", GridController);
    module.component("xuiGrid", Grid);
    module.service("xuiGridService", GridService);
    module.component("xuiGridToolbarTransclude", GridToolbarTransclude);
    module.component("xuiGridToolbarContainer", GridToolbarContainer);
 
    const translations = require("./grid-translations.json") as {[key:string]:string};
    module.app("components").config(xuiStatic.registerTranslations(translations));
 
    // support legacy names
    module.controller("swGridController", GridController);
    module.component("swGrid", Grid);
    module.service("swGridService", GridService);
    module.component("swGridToolbarTransclude", GridToolbarTransclude);
    module.component("swGridToolbarContainer", GridToolbarContainer);
};
